tldr: introduces an approach to generate gender-neutral word embeddings while preserving linguistic expressiveness

title: Man is to Computer Programmer as Woman is to Homemaker? Debiasing Word Embeddings
tldr: introduces a method to identify and remove gender bias from word embeddings using a projection-based approach [![GitHub](https://github.com/tolga-b/debiaswe)]

title: Semantics derived automatically from language corpora contain human-like biases
tldr: demonstrates that word embeddings trained on large corpora capture human-like biases, reflecting real-world stereotypes
